alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Canadian; Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan; Major; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 2:29AM CDT until June 10 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Logan County in central Oklahoma... Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... Eastern Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 228 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Breckenridge to 7 miles northeast of Loyal to 5 miles southwest of Watonga, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Enid, Perry, Watonga, Kingfisher, Fairview, Piedmont, Hennessey, Crescent, Waukomis, Okarche, Okeene, Garber, Cashion, Canton, Lahoma, Covington, Calumet, Ringwood, Dover, and Drummond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Canadian; Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan; Major; Noble
